title: Red ball rivalries & white ball worries
description: Henry Moeran is alongside the BBC’s chief cricket commentator Jonathan Agnew and TMS statistician Andy Zaltzman to look ahead to England’s Men’s 2025. With a home Test series against India and the Ashes down under at the end of the year, it could prove to be a pivotal year for Ben Stokes as captain.
author: BBC Radio 5 Live
excerpt: Henry Moeran, Jonathan Agnew & Andy Zaltzman look ahead to England’s men’s 2025.
